name: @ghosthire/circuits
description: Zero-Knowledge circuits for GhostHire eligibility verification

scripts.setup: npm run download-ptau && snarkjs groth16 setup eligibility.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_15.ptau eligibility_0000.zkey
scripts.contribute: snarkjs zkey contribute eligibility_0000.zkey eligibility_final.zkey --name='GhostHire Contribution' -v
scripts.generate-vkey: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey eligibility_final.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.verify-circuit: snarkjs groth16 verify verification_key.json public.json proof.json
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run setup && npm run contribute && npm run generate-vkey

author: GhostHire Team
